articles.title: Apple and Google oppose Senate antitrust efforts, claiming they'd hurt consumer security
articles.description:
With the Senate Judiciary Committee scheduled to discuss the American Innovation and Choice Online Act

articles.title: Apple, Mylan lose Supreme Court bids to challenge patent review rule - Reuters
articles.description: The U.S. Supreme Court on Tuesday turned back challenges by Apple Inc and drugmaker Mylan Laboratories Ltd to a rule change that made it harder to contest patents before the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office.
